greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Real part of (1 + 2i)^(2^n) where i is sqrt(-1).
comment: The next term a(8) has 90 digits and is too large to be displayed here.
formula: a(n) = real part of (2 + sqrt(-1))^(2^n) for n >= 0.
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Jul 14 2006
ext: Corrected and extended by _Stefan Steinerberger_ and _Emeric Deutsch_, Jul 23 2006
